project_plan.name: Weather Fetching CLI Application in Python
project_plan.description: Build a Python program that fetches current weather information for a given city using a public API.

task.name: Implement API integration to fetch weather data based on user input
Parse the API response to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Implement the command-line interface to accept user input for the city name
Display the fetched weather information in the terminal
Write tests for the API integration and data parsing
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
